title: Allow Multisig to allocate PNG for partners liquidity mining
body:
We are starting to align with some great partners in the ecosystem and as part of that, a lot of these partners have their own liquidity mining programs. We'd like to offer them PNG rewards to help solidify our relationship. Constantly asking for community permission means that this will slow down our ability to engage with them in a timely manner.

This vote will be about whether the Pangolin Multisig will have an ability to offer PNG rewards (up to 100K USD) to projects we deem as long term partners. 

If you'd like the Multisig to have autonomy on these decisions and trust us to choose partners to issue PNG rewards, then please choose yes.
choices: No, each should be voted on
author: 0xFd7b8597cF8eE5317439B0B5C55a111F6Eec449D
